alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:48PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Broward County through 545 PM EDT... At 448 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Everglades, or near Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Pompano Beach, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Lauderhill, Oakland Park, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Wilton Manors, Sea Ranch Lakes, Lazy Lake, Broadview-Pompano Park, St. George, Port Everglades, and Village Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County
